rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: A combined space that greets guests and serves as a living area with integrated indoor-outdoor transitions. Vastu principles align the entrance facing east.
rooms.vastu_notes: The entrance is oriented towards the north-east to welcome positive energy.

rooms.name: Kitchenette & Dining
rooms.description: A compact kitchen with an open dining area. Designed for efficient workflow and ample natural light, aligning with local residential norms.
rooms.vastu_notes: Placement of the kitchen is optimized to avoid directly facing the entrance.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom featuring an en-suite bathroom. The bed placement follows Vastu guidelines for rest and tranquility.
rooms.vastu_notes: The headboard should face the north direction.

rooms.name: Studio Bedroom
rooms.description: A smaller bedroom that can serve as an office or guest room. The space is designed for multifunctional use.
rooms.vastu_notes: The positioning avoids negative energy according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A functional bathroom with essential fixtures and efficient drainage. Its placement adheres to local construction norms.
rooms.vastu_notes: The water elements are placed in the north-west corner for positive energy.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A large, inviting entrance with a sliding glass door that opens to the garden area and swimming pool.
openings.vastu_notes: The entrance should be oriented towards the north-east for optimal energy flow.

openings.name: Balcony Window
openings.description: A large window offering views of the surrounding landscape and facilitating natural ventilation.
openings.vastu_notes: East-facing openings enhance morning light and positive energy.

openings.name: Pool Entrance
openings.description: A functional opening leading directly to a swimming pool integrated into the landscape design.
openings.vastu_notes: South side openings should balance heat, ensuring proper shading is provided.

swimming_pool.description: A contemporary swimming pool integrated into the landscape. The design ensures safety with a surrounding deck and proper drainage.
swimming_pool.vastu_notes: The pool is situated in an area that harmonizes with the overall energy flow of the property.
